description:
Skillful driving in the city is a very important skill for a taxi driver.
Complete orders using the most extreme driving called drift, surprising your customers in the time allotted to you, earn drift points by buying new cars to perform more beautiful drifts.
Features:
Variety of cars
Realistic driving
Beautiful graphics and city
Realistic and live traffic
Nice cars and garage
Various tasks around the city
Feel like a drift taxi driver in a beautiful and lively city by earning drift points and buying cars according to your drifting skills
name: Racing Drift Taxi Car Simulator Ultimate
